Summary Founder and CEO of Ledayek, a Small Business Consulting company, working personally with SB owners, directing them to the exact steps and actions that will grow their business.  
I believe that the exact steps to the business' growth stem from the specific business and not a "general" answer or solution. That's why I work with every business owner to personally adapt the support and solutions to the specific business and CEO - Personally adapted business consulting.
